languages.text: "Мариус, необязательно покидать корабль, чтобы творить добро. Здесь тебе хватит дел до конца жизни. Лечи людей и укрепляй их веру — разве этого мало?"
languages.translation_comment: При выборе дать 1 на каунтер CandidateBreak
При выборе дать 1 на каунтер CandidateBreak

languages.text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"
languages.original_text: "Мариус, необязательно покидать корабль, чтобы творить добро. Здесь тебе хватит дел до конца жизни. Лечи людей и укрепляй их веру — разве этого мало?"

traits.locale_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"
"Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"
"Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

"Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"
"Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

languages.text: « Marius, vous pouvez accomplir votre devoir sans quitter le vaisseau. Vous ne manquerez jamais de travail à bord, qu'il s'agisse de soigner les passagers ou de renforcer leur foi. Cela ne vous suffit-il pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

traits.locale_text: « Marius, vous pouvez accomplir votre devoir sans quitter le vaisseau. Vous ne manquerez jamais de travail à bord, qu'il s'agisse de soigner les passagers ou de renforcer leur foi. Cela ne vous suffit-il pas ? »

languages.text: «Marius, usted puede hacer mucho bien sin necesidad de abandonar esta nave. Tiene aquí trabajo suficiente para toda una vida. Sanar a los enfermos y reforzar su fe: ¿no le basta con eso?».
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

traits.locale_text: «Marius, usted puede hacer mucho bien sin necesidad de abandonar esta nave. Tiene aquí trabajo suficiente para toda una vida. Sanar a los enfermos y reforzar su fe: ¿no le basta con eso?».

languages.text: “马吕斯，你不用离开这艘船也可以做善事。你在这里有足够的工作，足以让你的余生过得很充实。治疗船上的人们，加深他们的信仰，难道这还不够吗？”
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

traits.locale_text: “马吕斯，你不用离开这艘船也可以做善事。你在这里有足够的工作，足以让你的余生过得很充实。治疗船上的人们，加深他们的信仰，难道这还不够吗？”

languages.text: 「マリウス、船を出る必要などない。お前には生涯出来る仕事がここにある。人を治療し、信念を強めることだ。これらの任務では満足できないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

traits.locale_text: 「マリウス、船を出る必要などない。お前には生涯出来る仕事がここにある。人を治療し、信念を強めることだ。これらの任務では満足できないのか？」

languages.text: "Marius, Ihr könnt auch Gutes tun, ohne das Schiff verlassen zu müssen. Ihr habt hier genügend Arbeit für den Rest Eures Lebens. Menschen heilen und ihren Glauben stärken, reicht das denn nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"

traits.locale_text: "Marius, Ihr könnt auch Gutes tun, ohne das Schiff verlassen zu müssen. Ihr habt hier genügend Arbeit für den Rest Eures Lebens. Menschen heilen und ihren Glauben stärken, reicht das denn nicht?"

languages.text: "Marius, gemiyi terk etmeden de iyi işler yapabilirsin. Sana ömrün boyunca yetecek kadar iş var burada. İnsanları tedavi et ve onların inancını güçlendir. Bu yeterli değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Marius, you can do good without having to leave the ship. You have enough work here to fill the rest of your life. Cure people and strengthen their faith: is that not enough?"
